history.proof: intros n m p H. apply N.ge_le in H. apply N.le_ge. strivial use: N.add_le_mono_l.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n m : nat, N.of_nat n >= N.of_nat m -> (n >= m)%nat" on hypothesis of type "m <= n".
In environment n, m, p : N H : m <= n Unable to unify "m <= n" with "p + m <= p + n".

original: intros n m p H. apply N.ge_le in H. apply N.le_ge. apply ge_Nge in H. apply H.
